Why we work?

  • Corrupt high-ranking
    officials

    easily launder dirty money through the international banking system.

  • Special rules have been introduced in
    the world

    to control the financial transactions of public persons: each financial institution must determine who their customers are, what is the nature of their money and assets, and where they come from.

  • If the client is a politically exposed person

    then his/her financial transactions should be carefully checked.
